Name: Boomerang Series
Description:
• Experience the future of freedom with our Volkano Boomerang Series Bluetooth Earphones. No longer will you have the hassle of cables coming out from armbands, pockets, or getting tied up as you move.
  • Connect your Volkano Boomerang Series Bluetooth Earphones to your iPhone, iPad, Android device, PC or Smart TV with quick and easy pairing. Bluetooth® version 4 technology gives you high-quality sound with minimal cost to battery life. Enjoy up to 3 hours of playback with the built-in rechargeable battery.
  • Pair your Volkano Boomerang Series Bluetooth Earphones to your mobile phone to answer calls and talk hands-free with a touch of the multi-function power button. Control track playback and volume levels from the earphones directly without needing your device.
  • The ergonomically designed ear-hooks keep the earphones secured to your ears; perfect for sports, gym and an active lifestyle where freedom of movement is essential.
Volkano Boomerang Series Bluetooth Earphones are designed with an active lifestyle in mind. Wireless technology removes all of the wires from your device. No cables, no connectors; just pair and enjoy your music, movies, games, and calls with modern Bluetooth® technology. Volkano Boomerang Series Bluetooth Earphones features integrated controls to easily control track playback, volume and answer calls on the go with Bluetooth® technology, all, without needing to reach for your device. The built-in microphone gives a full hands-free experience when taking calls. Comfortable earbuds make the Volkano Boomerang Series Bluetooth Earphones the ideal choice for an active lifestyle. You no longer need to worry about tangled cables or snagging a wire when performing motion-heavy activities like running, riding or lifting. Technical Specifications

Name: Cravat Series
Description:
The Cravat neckband offers a unique combination of convenience, features and battery life unmatched by any other in-ear headphone design. The earbuds retract from the neckband, allowing for the ultimate in cord management. The battery and controls are located in the neckband, meaning that the earbuds are really lightweight and comfortable and won’t weigh you down.

All of the controls you need are integrated directly into the neckband. Change volume, tracks, as well as answer calls on the go without needing to reach for your device.

Enjoy a full hands-free calling experience. The built-in microphone gives your caller crystal clear audio while you remain on the go. Calls are easily answered with an integrated control button on the earbuds. When you are done with your call, your music will start up again. No need to fiddle further with any more controls.

With a playback time of up to 12 hours on only a charge of 2 hours, you are easily covered for a whole day of music.

Name: Potent Series
Description:
• Built-in, ultra bright LED flashlight for those moments where you just need to shed a little light on the situation.
  • Suitable for phones and tablets, or any device that needs to be charged via USB ports.
  • Dual USB charging ports lets you charge two devices at the same time.
  • The battery level indicator keeps you updated on how much charge you have left for your devices. No need to worry just how much you have left.
  • Charge & discharge your devices up to 500 times.
Never get left in the dark again with the Potent Series 6000mAh Power Bank from Volkano. This large capacity power bank features ultra-fast charging from its two 2.1A output ports. The power bank has a built in battery level indicator, easily checked with a touch of the power button and included a bright LED flashlight, making this an ideal companion for blackouts or when camping. Keep your phone, tablet or other USB charged devices at full battery with the Volkano Potent Series power bank.

Name: Ultra Series
Description:
• Large capacity power bank for those extended periods of time that you are in the jungle out there.
  • Dual USB charging ports to keep two devices on the go!
  • Built-in LED flashlight for those times where you need to shed a little light on the subject.
  • Digital power status display, so you will always know exactly how much charge you have left. Don't be caught out with suprises.
  • The stylish two-tone metallic finish sets it apart from the other Power Banks out there; it looks great whichever way you look at it.
Keep your essential devices charged with the Ultra Series power bank from Volkano. The Ultra Series features a 10 400mAh battery, giving you up to 5 charges of a standard smartphone. The power bank charges via Micro USB and has a standard 1A USB port and a 2.1A fast-charging USB port for charging multiple electronics on the go. The built-in flashlight illuminates in the event of a night time power outage and you can monitor your battery level with the LED power status indicator. The stylish finish and compact design make it comfortable to fit in your pocket or backpack while still offering a great power storage option. Never get caught in the dark again with the Ultra Series power bank from Volkano.

Name: Network Series
Description:
• Fully moulded plugs ensure a great connection every time.
  • Connects a computer to a printer, router, switch box or other network components in a wired Local Area Network (LAN).
  • Share server files, use a network printer, stream audio or videos, link computers through a network switch and more.
  • RJ45 connectors ensure universal connectivity.

Name: Strike Series
Description:
• MFI Certified for full compatiblity with Apple devices.
  • Suitable for both Charging and Data Transfer.
  • Designed to work with your iPod, iPhone, or iPad.
  • 1.2m for the perfect length you need. Not too short, and not too long.
  • Moulded connectors for reliability and durability.
The Lightning connector that iPhones, iPods and iPads have been using since 2012 is a proprietary connector created by Apple. Inside each lightning connector is a tiny authentication chip that tells your device it’s Apple MFI Certified. This is important because non-certified, or knock-off, lightning cables can be very dangerous to your device. (You may have noticed a warning message on your phone when a non-MFI cable was detected.) The Volkano Strike Series MFI Lightning Cable is MFI Certified.   Available At : Makro | Jumia

Name: Sync Series
Short description: True Wireless Earphones with Charging Carry Case
Description:
• Experience the future of sound with True Wireless Stereo technology! No more fiddling with cables and plugs, Volkano Sync True Wireless earbuds deliver crystal clear stereo over Bluetooth® for hassle free listening pleasure at home, work, gym or while travelling.
  • Enjoy up to 10 hours of playback time on a single charge of the combination charger and carry case. The easy to use, 500 mAh capacity power bank has magnetized compartments for both earbuds, keeping them safe and secure while charging.
  • Connect your True Wireless Earbuds to your iPhone, iPad, Android device, PC or Smart TV with quick and easy pairing. Bluetooth® version 4 technology gives you high quality sound with minimal cost to battery life. Link both earphones together for a stereo audio experience or connect each earbud individually to separate devices.
  • Pair your Volkano Sync earphones to your mobile phone to answer calls and talk hands-free with a touch of the multi-function power button. DSP (Digital Signal Processing) technology ensures clear audio with minimal noise.
  • Achieve a comfortable, snug fit with three different sizes of silicone ear tips and enjoy the lightweight earbuds hooked securely in your ears. Perfect for sports, gym and an active lifestyle!
Volkano Sync True Wireless Stereo Bluetooth Earbuds introduce True Wireless Stereo technology. TWS gives you a full stereo audio experience with no annoying wires to your music device or each earphone. Earbuds can be used in stereo for left-right channel split, or can be paired separately with different devices for a mono channel experience. The handy earbud carry case offers safe storage when your Volkano Sync earbuds are not in use and doubles as a charging station with up to five recharges on a full battery. The magnetized, molded compartments secure your earphones when charging and the station is small enough to fit in your pocket or handbag. True Wireless earbuds are ideal for home or work, with no wires to unravel or plugs to find, just pair and enjoy your music, movies, games or calls. Many modern phones no longer have an audio-out jack, making Bluetooth earphones the smart choice as technology moves forward. Description:
UNDENIABLY STYLISH AND UNIQUE. You won't find another Bluetooth speaker that looks anything like it. Set a trend in your office or home with a style that says something about your unique tastes. It’s the best of both worlds; portable with superb sound! Audio for all occasions: Simply pair your Bluetooth device, and start streaming your favorite tunes in an instant. The included MicroSD and USB ports offer an alternative way to play music on different storage mediums. The included 3.5mm jack also gives you an additional way to connect your music. Treble and mid-range sounds are backed up with two 1.2W 1.4-inch driver speakers. Big sound in a surprisingly small form factor. Take your beats with you: The Volkano Bazooka is designed for the ultimate in portability without sacrificing sound quality. Name: Silenco Series
Description:
• Active Noise Cancelling
  • Hands-free Calling
  • Removable Aux Cable
  • Airplane Adaptor included for Travel

  • Hard Carry Case Included
  • Adjustable Headband and swivelling earcups.
Up to 30 Hours Playtime Reduce background noise at work, home or when travelling with incredible Active Noise Cancelling technology. Ambient noise is detected by an on-board microphone and a signal is generated to greatly reduce external noise like aeroplane engines, office hubbub or loud crowds. You will hear and feel the difference! Powerful 40mm Drivers deliver dynamic bass tones and clean high notes from the comfortable, padded ear cups. The Silenco Active Noise Cancelling headphones ensure maximum listening pleasure, wherever you are. Connect wirelessly when you pair your Volkano Silenco headphones to your mobile phone, tablet or PC with Bluetooth 4.0 and control your music with the on-board playback control buttons. Or connect with a 3.5 mm aux cable to any device. Noise Cancelling works in both Bluetooth and aux modes. Answer calls wirelessly when paired to your phone by simply pressing the multi-function button. Once your call is over, your music will resume; no interruptions, no fiddling with awkward controls or having to take your phone out of your pocket. Enjoy up to 30 hours of playtime on a single charge. Your Silenco headphones are the perfect travel companion. A full frequency response range gives you crystal clear percussion and deep bass notes for the most enjoyable listening experience. Specifications:
  • Bluetooth Version: 4.0
  • Chipset: CSR8635
  • Supported Profiles: A2DP, AVRCP, HFP, HSP
  • Operating Distance: 10 m / 33 ft
  • Frequency Response: 20 Hz – 20 kHz
  • Sensitivity: 105 dB
  • Driver: Ø40 mm / 1.57”
  • Impedance: 32 Ω
  • Battery Capacity: 500 mAh
  • Charge Time: 3 Hours
  • Playtime: 22 – 30 Hours
  • Noise Reduction Performance: Up to 20 dB

Name: Find Me Series
Description:
• Keep track of your kids with GPS and LBS technology.
  • Contact your child with 2-way communication.
  • Receive an alert if the watch is removed.
  • SOS Auto-Call button for emergencies.
  • Geo-Fencing technology alerts you when your child leaves a predefined zone.
Keep track of your kids with the Find Me Series of child-friendly tracking watches from Volkano. Simply download the watch app to your Android or Apple smartphone, pair the watch to your phone and monitor your child's whereabouts at the touch of a button. The watch uses GPS and Location Based Services technology to locate your child wherever they are, and the ability to set up a geofence means that you get a call if ever your child moves from where they should be. Check in quickly with 2-way communication and immediately raise the alarm with the built-in SOS auto-call button. The watch will even send an alarm if it is removed unexpectedly. Enjoy peace of mind for your little ones with the Volkano Find Me Series GPS tracking watch.
  • Screen: 0.96 inch OLED
  • Chipset: MTK6261, 364MHZ
  • Location: GPS, AGPS, LBS
  • GPS: MTK3337, 22 Channels
  • AGPS GPRS: Class 12, Location Time 26 sec
  • LBS L1, 1575.42MHZ C/A code
  • GSM,GPRS: 850/900/1800/1900

Name: Stream Pro Series
Description:
• Multi-Function Professional USB Microphone.

The Volkano Stream Series Microphone is the ideal choice for recording your voice. Whether you are live streaming, podcasting, recording musical performances or voiceovers, the Stream Series has features ideal for home and studio use. This versatile microphone can switch between cardioid mode for single-person recordings and omnidirectional mode for conference calls or multi-person recording. Plug & Play with USB Type-C technology means you will be up and running in no time, and the built-in aux output means zero latency monitoring through a pair of headphones. Use the included desk stand, or connect the Stream Series Microphone to a mic stand via the universal connector. Go pro, with the Volkano Stream Series Pro USB Microphone.

Name: Supreme Series
Short description: Active Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones with Airplane Adaptor, 3.5mm Aux Cable and Hard Carry Case
Description:
• < 1 Hour Type-C Fast Charging
  • Up to 25 Hours Playtime
  • 23 dB Noise Reduction with Active Noise Cancelling
  • Folding Design
  • Extra Soft, Padded Ear Cups
  • Includes Airplane Adaptor for travel
  • Hard Carry Case, 3.5mm Aux Cable, Charging cable included.
Reduce background noise at work, home or when travelling with incredible Active Noise Cancelling technology. Ambient noise is detected by an on-board microphone and a signal is generated to greatly reduce external noise like aeroplane engines, office hubbub or loud crowds. You will hear and feel the difference! Powerful 40mm Drivers deliver dynamic bass tones and clean high notes from the comfortable, padded ear cups. Up to an incredible 25 hours of playtime off a quick charge of less than 1 hour. Accessories included are a Carry Case for storage and protection as well as an Airplane Adaptor. Answer calls wirelessly when paired to your phone by simply pressing the multi-function button. A full frequency response range gives you crystal clear percussion and deep bass notes for the most enjoyable listening experience. Specifications:
  • Bluetooth Version: 5.0
  • Bluetooth Chipset: CSR
  • Operating Distance: 10 m
  • Frequency Response: 20 Hz – 20 kHz
  • Sensitivity: 105 dB
  • ANC Noise Reduction: 23 dB
  • Driver: 40 mm
  • Impedance: 32 Ω
  • Battery Capacity: 500 mAh
  • Charge Time: 1 Hours
  • Playback Time: 12 – 25 Hours
  • Charge Input: 5 V DC , 2 A
  Available At : Jumia

Name: Volkano Omni Plus Series Universal Laptop Charger
